items.name: general
items.description: General simulation settings.

items.name: gui
items.description: Ocean model and configuration level choice.

items.name: model
items.description: Ocean model to be used for the downscaling experiment. Currently, NEMO (Madec, 2008) and Shyfem (Umgiesser et al., 2004) are supported.

items.name: config_level
items.description: User configuration level. Choose base mode for a straightforward experience, or expert mode to access advanced features and configuration options.

items.name: experiment
items.description: Spatial and temporal settings for the simulation.

items.name: experiment_name
items.description: Unique identifier for the experiment.

items.name: domain
items.description: Spatial domain settings.

items.name: domHgr
items.description: Horizontal grid settings.

items.name: jp_cfg
items.description: Child model resolution (e.g. 1/48 deg)

items.name: ppglam0
items.description: Longitude of the first row and column of the T-grid.

items.name: ppglam1
items.description: Longitude of the last row and column of the T-grid.

items.name: ppgphi0
items.description: Latitude of the first row and column of the T-grid.

items.name: ppgphi1
items.description: Latitude of the last row and column of the T-grid.

items.name: domZgrzco
items.description: Vertical grid settings.

items.name: jpkdta
items.description: Number of vertical levels for the grid.

items.name: run_management
items.description: Date and time settings.

items.name: start_date
items.description: Start date of the simulation. Format: YYYYMMDD (the run starts at 00:00:00).

items.name: n_days
items.description: Total number of simulation days (first and last day are included).

items.name: n_days_spinup
items.description: Number of spin-up days to be considered before the first day of the simulation.

items.name: n_days_chunk
items.description: Number of days for each restart simulation chunk.

items.name: tasks_management
items.description: Tasks to be executed during the simulation. For tasks that are not enabled, pre-computed data caches must exist (e.g. from previous simulation runs).

items.name: grid_generation
items.description: Enables the execution the child grid generation task.

items.name: surface_bc
items.description: Enables the generation of the regridded atmospheric forcings files, used for surface boundary conditions.

items.name: ocean_ic
items.description: Enables the generation of the regridded ocean files for the initial conditions.

items.name: lateral_bc
items.description: Enables the generation of the regridded ocean files for the lateral boundary conditions.

items.name: regridPreTide
items.description: Enables the generation of the regridded tidal forcing files.

items.name: simulation
items.description: Enables the execution of the ocean simulation.

items.name: nesting
items.description: Nesting settings.

items.name: nnest
items.description: Number of nesting for Multiple downscaling experiment. If > 1 consecutive nested models will be implemented with increasing grid resolutions

items.name: grid_generation
items.description: Generation of the 3D downscaled grid.

items.name: coastline
items.description: Coastline settings.

items.name: input_product
items.description: Coastline data input product.

items.name: username
items.description: Username to access the dataset from a remote ftp server

items.name: password
items.description: Password to access the dataset from a remote ftp server

items.name: url
items.description: Dataset url (can be a local file or a remote ftp server).

items.name: lands
items.description: Filename of the lands shapefile

items.name: islands
items.description: Filename of the islands shapefile

items.name: lakes
items.description: Filename of the lakes shapefile

items.name: bathymetry
items.description: Bathymetry settings.

items.name: input_product
items.description: Bathymetry data input product.

items.name: interpolate
items.description: Enables the use of the bathymetry regridding, adaptation based on coastline datasets and custom manipulations.

items.name: username
items.description: Username to access the dataset from a remote ftp server

items.name: password
items.description: Password to access the dataset from a remote ftp server

items.name: url
items.description: Dataset url (can be a local file or a remote ftp server).

items.name: filenames
items.description: Input dataset.

items.name: lon
items.description: Name of the longitude dimension.

items.name: lat
items.description: Name of the latitude dimension.

items.name: lon
items.description: Name of the longitude coordinate.

items.name: lat
items.description: Name of the latitude coordinate.

items.name: elevation
items.description: Name of the elevation variable.

items.name: modify
items.description: Modify bathymetry data.

items.name: global_offset
items.description: Global offset in meters to apply to the bathymetry (es. caspian Sea 28 meter). Can be negative or positive.

items.name: regions
items.description: coordinates of a list of rectangular region in which to apply depth modification

items.name: coords
items.description: Region coordinates in the format 'min_lon1,max_lon1,min_lat1,max_lat1 min_lon2,max_lon2,min_lat2,max_lat2 ...'

items.name: depth
items.description: Depth value to be assigned within the rectangular area

items.name: surface_bc
items.description: Generation of the regridded atmospheric forcings files, used for surface boundary conditions.

items.name: input_product
items.description: Atmosphere input data product.

items.name: offline
items.description: Custom product settings.

items.name: username
items.description: Username to access the dataset from a remote ftp server

items.name: password
items.description: Password to access the dataset from a remote ftp server

items.name: src_url
items.description: Dataset url (can be a local file or a remote ftp server).

items.name: windi
items.description: Parametric name of the windi land-sea mask data (if formulation is mfs_bulk or core).

items.name: windj
items.description: Parametric name of the windj land-sea mask data (if formulation is mfs_bulk or core).

items.name: tair
items.description: Parametric name of the tair land-sea mask data (if formulation is mfs_bulk or core).

items.name: rhm
items.description: Parametric name of the rhm land-sea mask data (if formulation is mfs_bulk).

items.name: clc
items.description: Parametric name of the clc land-sea mask data (if formulation is mfs_bulk).

items.name: precip
items.description: Parametric name of the precip land-sea mask data (if formulation is mfs_bulk or core).

items.name: msl
items.description: Parametric name of the msl land-sea mask data (if formulation is mfs_bulk or sbc_apr_dyn is true).

items.name: windi
items.description: Parametric name of the windi data (if formulation is mfs_bulk or core).

items.name: windj
items.description: Parametric name of the windj data (if formulation is mfs_bulk or core).

items.name: tair
items.description: Parametric name of the tair data (if formulation is mfs_bulk or core).

items.name: rhm
items.description: Parametric name of the rhm data (if formulation is mfs_bulk).

items.name: clc
items.description: Parametric name of the clc data (if formulation is mfs_bulk).

items.name: precip
items.description: Parametric name of the precip data (if formulation is mfs_bulk or core).

items.name: msl
items.description: Parametric name of the msl data  (if formulation is mfs_bulk or sn_apr_dyn is true).

items.name: dates_format
items.description: Format of the dates in the parametric filenames.

items.name: production_weekday
items.description: Regular production day of the dataset (Monday, Tuesday, ...).

items.name: formulation
items.description: Surface boundary condition parametrization. Choose between msf_bulk, fluxform+ssRest and core parametrizations.

items.name: lon
items.description: Name of the longitude dimension.

items.name: lat
items.description: Name of the latitude dimension.

items.name: time
items.description: Name of the time dimension.

items.name: lon
items.description: Name of the longitude T-points coordinate.

items.name: lat
items.description: Name of the latitude T-points coordinate.

items.name: time
items.description: Name of the time coordinate.

items.name: mask
items.description: Name of the land-sea mask T-points variable.

items.description: Name of the longitude dimension.

items.name: lat
items.description: Name of the latitude dimension.

items.description: Name of the longitude dimension.

items.description: Name of the latitude dimension.

items.name: time
items.description: Name of the time dimension.

items.name: lon
items.description: Name of the longitude T-points coordinate.

items.name: lat
items.description: Name of the latitude T-points coordinate.

items.name: time
items.description: Name of the time coordinate.

items.name: windi
items.description: Zonal Component of the 10m wind at points T in m/s (if formulation is mfs_bulk or core)

items.name: windj
items.description: Meridional Component of the 10m wind at points T in m/s (if formulation is mfs_bulk or core)

items.name: clc
items.description: Total cloud cover at points T in % (if formulation is mfs_bulk)

items.name: tair
items.description: 2m Air Temperature at points T in K (if formulation is mfs_bulk or core)

items.name: rhm
items.description: 2m Dew Point Temperature at points T in K (if formulation is mfs_bulk)

items.name: precip
items.description: Total Precipitation at points T in kg/m^2/s (if formulation is mfs_bulk or core)

items.name: msl
items.description: Mean sea-level pressure at points T in Pa (if formulation is mfs_bulk or sbc_apr_dyn is true)

items.name: buffer_size
items.description: Number of pixels to add around the subset.

items.name: method
items.description: Interpolation method used to map the input data on the downscaled grid

items.name: interpolate_time
items.description: Time interpolation. Choose between step-like shape forcing (false) and broken-line shape forcing (true).

items.name: ocean_ic
items.description: Generation of the regridded ocean files for the initial conditions.

items.name: input_product
items.description: Ocean data input product used for the initial condition generation.

items.name: username
items.description: Username to access the dataset from a remote ftp server

items.name: password
items.description: Password to access the dataset from a remote ftp server

items.name: url
items.description: Dataset url (can be a local file or a remote ftp server).

items.name: staggered
items.description: Staggered or unstaggered grid?

items.name: regular
items.description: Regular spherical or irregular non-spherical grid?
